hero.title: Ramen + Fermentation
hero.main-text: We are a growing project that aims to use high cuisine techniques and fermentation to create flavors that combine contemporary japanese ramen with flavors and ingredients from Latin America.

projects.title: Ramen Shop üçú
projects.description: Reduced menu of Japanese tapas and ramen, with a focus on the quality of ingredients and preparation techniques.

projects.title: Products üì¶
projects.description: High-quality products such as kombuchas, misos, koji, and more are made using traditional and modern fermentation techniques.

projects.title: Pop-ups üëØ
projects.description: Working in collaboration with other restaurants to expand our proposal to new spaces, experiment, and learn from others.
